creator: Tradesoft Business Services
descriptionHtml:
Burgan Trade’s novel mobile trading platform now available on Android!
This application, provided by Burgan Securities to its clients free of charge, will enable you to log on with your user name and password wherever Internet is available and access your portfolio 7/24; to monitor your real time cost and profit/loss status; to follow latest developments in Turkish and global markets via news broadcasts from a variety of news agencies; to access real time market data free of charge and to carry out transactions in Equity and Derivatives Markets in a fast and secure manner.
Our clients may personalise their application pages to suit their preferences based on simple and user-friendly menus; may set up follow-up lists and access all markets from a single screen; and engage in direct trading.
descriptionShort: Burgan Trade’s novel mobile trading platform now available on Android!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
*Yeni özellik* Portföy ekranının sağ üst köşesine "Pozisyonlarım" sayfası eklendi.
*Yeni özellik* Piyasa ekranında, pay ve türev kıymetleri sola sürüklendiğinde ilgili kıymet için ‘Hızlı Emir’ penceresinin açılması sağlandı.
Talepleriniz ve önerileriniz doğrultusunda genel performans iyileştirmeleri yapıldı.

creator: Burgan Yatırım Menkul Değerler A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Local and International markets: All-in-one app!

Burgan Securities’ easy-to-use application Burgan Trade gives you instantaneous access to local and international markets, enabling you to perform and execute your investment transactions.



By downloading Burgan Trade, you can trade stocks, VIOP, warrants and ETFs, easily participate in public offers in local markets; stocks, ETFs and bonds in international markets, while watching BIST 100 and BIST 30 market data.



Discover Burgan Trade for instant short-term and long-term market research and reports, cockpit display for quick order submission, temperature map, realtime data screens and much more!
descriptionShort: Burgan Trade’s novel mobile trading platform now available on Android!

Sarıyer/İstanbul
